Quick question (for once):

How do I change text colour when printing an expression?
Ex: I want this text (below) to be displayed in this color: #9c5c32
```
msg ("Would $" + player.money + " suffice? It's all I have!")
```

```<font color=#9c5c32 size=4>"Text"</font>``` works well went printing a msg but is it possible to change font colour when printing an expression?

msg ("Would $" + player.money + " suffice? It's all I have!")

Posts.EditableText:
It worked. I was putting the tags in the wrong place. 
Silly me.
